course_name: Leading and Managing the Future in Pharmacy Practice
description: This course offers students insight into management issues around pharmacy, pharmaceutical and health care, preparing them for leadership roles in their chosen field of clinical practice. Students will gain insight into leadership, management and organisational dynamics, quality assurance in health systems, human resource management basics, offering them skills and knowledge for advancing their career in the future.
restricted: This course is restricted to students enrolled in the Graduate Certificate/Graduate Diploma/Masters of Clinical Pharmacy
